description:
On July 31, according to foreign media reports, the global Music Television (Music Television MTV) is trying to persuade pop diva Beyonce to perform a opening show separately for this year's "the MTV Video Music Awards" ceremony .

据外媒7月31日报道，全球音乐电视台(Music Television简称MTV)正试图劝说流行天后碧昂丝(Beyoncé)单独为今年的“MTV音乐录影带大奖”( MTV Video Music Awards )颁奖典礼进行开场表演。

Although the message has not been announced, according to some staff of Columbia Record Company, it is said that MTV is pleading with Beyonce to choose a few for singing from the album released last year. This album had won a global iTunes sales champion. Columbia Record Company also collaborate with MTV to make an extravagent advertising video for Beyonce.

尽管消息尚未对外宣布，但据哥伦比亚唱片公司内部人员透露，MTV确实恳求碧昂丝能从去年发售的同名专辑《绝对碧昂丝》(Beyoncé)中选择几首进行演唱。这张专辑曾获得全球iTunes 销售冠军。哥伦比亚唱片公司也正和MTV联手为碧昂丝制作大手笔的广告视频片。

In the MTV video music awards nominations released on July 17, 2014, local time, Beyonce lead the pack with eight norminations including The Best Video Award of the year. Among them, she and her husband Jay-z's cooperation "Drunk in Love" got a finalist for The Best Video of the year and The Best Collaboration respectively.

当地时间7月17日公布的2014“MTV音乐录影带大奖”提名名单中，碧昂丝入围包括年度最佳录影带在内的八项大奖，领跑众星。其中，她与丈夫Jay-Z合作的《Drunk in Love》分别入围了年度最佳录影带和最佳组合两个奖项。

The MTV has not invited Jay-z, perhaps is a good thing for Beyonce. As a singer, performing alone can help her to restart a new singing career after leaving Jay-z. However, we may feel sorry for the kinds of rumors about the complicate situations of them. It is said that the MTV awards ceremony of 2014 will be held on August 24 in California.

此次MTV却并未邀请Jay-Z一道，对碧昂丝来说或许是件好事。作为歌手，单独进行表演可以帮助其离开Jay-Z重创事业。但联想两人此前扑朔迷离的种种传闻，着实让人唏嘘。 据悉，2014年“MTV音乐录影带大奖”颁奖仪式将于美国当地时间8月24日在加州的英格尔伍德广场举行。

Let's expect the wonderful performances of Beyonce together!

我们一起来期待碧昂丝的精彩表演吧！
